txt.en: Orcs can be found along the Forest River, between Felegoth and Loeglond.\n\nYou should defeat the Orc ambushers and hunters that have come down from the Green Mountains.

'I am glad you have come, [placeholder]! I have received more reports of Orcs venturing down from the Green Mountains this very morning. We cannot allow them to continue to disrupt trade along the Forest River, but I have none to spare for this task.\n\n'Will you aid us and drive the Orcs back into the mountains?'
Lorndúr can be found in Loeglond.\n\nYou should talk to Lorndúr.
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing 'Restoring the Three Kingdoms' will cancel this quest</rgb>
Despite your efforts, Orcs from the Green Mountains continue to disrupt trade and harass the Raft-elves of Loeglond.
'Thank you, [placeholder]. Perhaps now that the war is over, these occurrences will be less frequent.\n\n'Nevertheless, I would appreciate it if you returned tomorrow.'
